entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company that had a Share Purchase Agreement to acquire Arm from SoftBank, which was terminated due to regulatory challenges.

entities.name: SOFTBANK
entities.description: SoftBank is a company that had a Share Purchase Agreement with NVIDIA for the acquisition of Arm, which was terminated due to regulatory challenges.

entities.name: ARM
entities.description: Arm is a company that was to be acquired by NVIDIA from SoftBank, but the acquisition was terminated due to regulatory challenges.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA and SoftBank had a Share Purchase Agreement for the acquisition of Arm, which was terminated due to regulatory challenges.
NVIDIA was to acquire Arm from SoftBank, but the acquisition was terminated due to regulatory challenges.
SoftBank was to sell Arm to NVIDIA, but the acquisition was terminated due to regulatory challenges.
